articles.title: Chemical firm Lanxess buys U.S.-based Emerald Kalama in $1.1 billion deal - Reuters
articles.description: German chemical company Lanxess is buying U.S.-based Emerald Kalama Chemical for an enterprise value of about $1.08 billion to strengthen its consumer business.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
FILE PHOTO: A logo of Lanxess is seen next to dark clouds at Cologne Bonn airport March 27, 2015. REUTERS/Wolfgang Rattay
